revised_title: Researches on the Colouring-Matters Derived from Coal-Tar: Diphenylamine
tldr: The author investigates the composition of aniline-blue and discovers the presence of diphenylamine in the products of distillation of rosaniline, leucaniline, and melaniline. Diphenylamine exhibits a unique reaction with concentrated nitric acid, revealing its relation to color-generating aniline and allowing for its identification in various compounds.
